content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is XYZ AI, here to help you schedule your HVAC service. May I have your name, please?
Nice to meet you, Linda! Could you please provide your address so I can confirm our service availability?
Thank you, Linda. You are within our service area. Could you please tell me the ideal time for the HVAC service?
I am available any afternoon next week.
Thanks for letting me know. I will check our available slots for any afternoon next week.
We have an opening next Wednesday at 2 PM. The estimated price for our HVAC service is $350. Does that work for you?
Oh, that is a little more than I was expecting. I’m on a tight budget, I’m afraid. Could it be less expensive?

I understand budget concerns, Linda. Our pricing reflects quality and expertise. Unfortunately, I cannot offer discounts, but you might consider a basic service instead. Would you like me to provide a price estimate for a basic HVAC checkup?
No, I think I will hold off for now. Thank you for your help.
reason: Customer declined due to price too high for budget
